title.value: GANSpiration: Balancing Targeted and Serendipitous Inspiration in User Interface Design with Style-Based Generative Adversarial Network
title.justification: The title is directly stated at the beginning of the paper and reflects the central theme of the research, which is the use of GANs for UI design inspiration.
title.quote: GANSpiration: Balancing Targeted and Serendipitous Inspiration in User Interface Design with Style-Based Generative Adversarial Network

extractions.description: The paper proposes the GANSpiration approach using StyleGAN to generate user interface (UI) design examples that provide both targeted and serendipitous inspiration. The approach aims to balance between focused design ideas and creative exploration, leveraging StyleGAN's ability to synthesize diverse and relevant design artifacts from a large dataset of UI images.

type.justification: The paper includes quantitative and qualitative evaluations of the proposed GANSpiration method through metrics and user studies, indicating empirical research focused on validation through experimentation.
type.quote: A quantitative evaluation revealed that the outputs of GANSpiration-based example suggestion approaches are relevant to the input design, and at the same time include diverse instances.

name.justification: The primary focus of the paper is on leveraging GANs for user interface design inspiration, which is a significant area within Human-Computer Interaction.
name.quote: Inspiration from design examples plays a crucial role in the creative process of user interface design.

name.justification: The paper discusses using generative models to support creativity in design, which falls under creativity support tools.
name.quote: Overall, our work paves the road of using advanced generative machine learning techniques in supporting the creative design practice.

name.justification: The paper uses StyleGAN, a type of GAN, as its core technology, making GANs a relevant research field.
name.quote: Particularly, we propose GANSpiration, a set of approaches that use a style-based generative adversarial network (StyleGAN).

name.justification: The paper explicitly uses StyleGAN for generating diverse and relevant UI design examples based on input images.
name.quote: Particularly, we propose GANSpiration, a set of approaches that use a style-based generative adversarial network (StyleGAN).

is_contributed.justification: StyleGAN is used as part of the GANSpiration approach but is not a novel contribution of the paper itself.
is_contributed.quote: While our work is based on the original StyleGAN work, we expect the performance of our approach can be enhanced by using more advanced generative models, such as StyleGAN2.

is_executed.justification: The paper describes the practical implementation of StyleGAN, including training and generating UI designs using GPUs.
is_executed.quote: We used a server that contained four NVidia V100SXM2 GPUs to train the model.

is_compared.justification: GANSpiration was compared against other methods like random and similarity-based example suggestions.
is_compared.quote: We found that the GANSpiration-based methods provide much more diverse design examples than a similarity-based method.

referenced_paper_title.value: A Style-Based Generator Architecture for Generative Adversarial Networks
referenced_paper_title.justification: The paper references the original StyleGAN work as the foundational architecture for their GANSpiration method.
referenced_paper_title.quote: StyleGAN, or Style-Based Generative Adversarial Network [20], extends the traditional GAN architecture.

name.justification: The paper uses the Rico dataset to train StyleGAN for generating UI design examples.
name.quote: We used the Rico dataset for StyleGAN training. It contains 66,261 unique UI screenshots of Android apps.

referenced_paper_title.value: Rico: A Mobile App Dataset for Building Data-Driven Design Applications
referenced_paper_title.justification: The referenced paper provides detailed information on the Rico dataset, which is used in this research.
referenced_paper_title.quote: We used the Rico dataset [9] for StyleGAN training.

name.justification: TensorFlow is mentioned as the framework used to implement and train the StyleGAN model in this study.
name.quote: We built upon the official TensorFlow implementation of StyleGAN and used our preprocessed dataset to train the model.

referenced_paper_title.value: TensorFlow: Large-Scale Machine Learning on Heterogeneous Distributed Systems
referenced_paper_title.justification: TensorFlow is widely known, and though not directly cited with a paper title, its role in the implementation is clear.
referenced_paper_title.quote: We built upon the official TensorFlow implementation of StyleGAN.
